General.Name: Beijing LabTech Instruments Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Labtech Instruments Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies laboratory products and solutions to laboratory industry worldwide. It offers water chillers, rotary evaporators, digestion blocks, hotplates, vacuum pumps, vacuum controllers, AutoClean GPC cleanup, sepline solid phase extraction, seapath solid phase extraction, concentration systems, analytical instruments, and consumables. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Beijing, China.
